Address.value: 1 WATERVIEW DRIVE, SHELTON, Connecticut, 06484, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Acme United Corp is a supplier of innovative first aid and medical products and cutting technology to the school, home, office, hardware, sporting goods and industrial markets. Its principal products sold across all segments are First aid kits, and Medical products, Scissors, Shears, Knives, Rulers, Pencil sharpeners and Sharpening tools. The company sells its products primarily to mass market and e-commerce retailers, industrial distributors, wholesale, contract and retail stationery distributors, office supply superstores, sporting goods stores, and hardware chains. Its operations are in the United States, Canada, Europe and Asia.
